name: VMToolsd Suspicious Child Process
description: Detects suspicious child process creations of VMware Tools process which may indicate persistence setup
query: ((process.parent.executable:/.*\\[Vv][Mm][Tt][Oo][Oo][Ll][Ss][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND (process.executable:(/.*\\[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Rr][Uu][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ll]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Rr][Ee][Gg][Ss][Vv][Rr]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR process.pe.original_file_name:(/[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/ OR /[Rr][Uu][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ll]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Rr][Ee][Gg][Ss][Vv][Rr]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Ww][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))) AND (NOT (process.command_line:(/.*\\[Vv][Mm][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Vv][Mm][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\ [Tt][Oo][Oo][Ll][Ss]\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Oo][Nn]\-[Vv][Mm]\-[Dd][Ee][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt]\.[Bb][Aa][Tt].*/ OR /.*\\[Vv][Mm][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Vv][Mm][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\ [Tt][Oo][Oo][Ll][Ss]\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Oo][Ff][Ff]\-[Vv][Mm]\-[Dd][Ee][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt]\.[Bb][Aa][Tt].*/ OR /.*\\[Vv][Mm][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Vv][Mm][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\ [Tt][Oo][Oo][Ll][Ss]\\[Rr][Ee][Ss][Uu][Mm][Ee]\-[Vv][Mm]\-[Dd][Ee][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt]\.[Bb][Aa][Tt].*/ OR /.*\\[Vv][Mm][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Vv][Mm][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\ [Tt][Oo][Oo][Ll][Ss]\\[Ss][Uu][Ss][Pp][Ee][Nn][Dd]\-[Vv][Mm]\-[Dd][Ee][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt]\.[Bb][Aa][Tt].*/))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.parent.executable:*\\vmtoolsd.exe AND (process.executable:(*\\cmd.exe OR *\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe OR *\\rundll32.exe OR *\\regsvr32.exe OR *\\wscript.exe OR *\\cscript.exe) OR process.pe.original_file_name:(Cmd.Exe OR PowerShell.EXE OR pwsh.dll OR RUNDLL32.EXE OR REGSVR32.EXE OR wscript.exe OR cscript.exe))) AND (NOT (process.command_line:(*\\VMware\\VMware\ Tools\\poweron\-vm\-default.bat* OR *\\VMware\\VMware\ Tools\\poweroff\-vm\-default.bat* OR *\\VMware\\VMware\ Tools\\resume\-vm\-default.bat* OR *\\VMware\\VMware\ Tools\\suspend\-vm\-default.bat*))))`
